name: script.updateReadings
Create Setting
Check Modbus Setting
Read Modbus
func:
var modeBusCommand = { 'fc': 0x3, 'unitid': 1, 'address': 0 , 'quantity': 4 } ;
return {topic: "readStatus", payload:modeBusCommand};

name: LED 0
func:
msg.payload = { value: msg.payload, 'fc': 0x6, 'unitid': 1, 'address': 0 , 'quantity': 1 } ;
return msg;

name: LED 1
func:
msg.payload = { value: msg.payload, 'fc': 0x6, 'unitid': 1, 'address': 1 , 'quantity': 1 } ;
return msg;

name: LED 2
func:
msg.payload = { value: msg.payload, 'fc': 0x6, 'unitid': 1, 'address': 2 , 'quantity': 1 } ;
return msg;

name: LED 3
func:
msg.payload = { value: msg.payload, 'fc': 0x6, 'unitid': 1, 'address': 3 , 'quantity': 1 } ;
return msg;

template: LED Control

name: Get Signal Quality
Get SSID
func:
var ssid = msg.payload.substring(msg.payload.indexOf("ESSID") + 6).split('\n')[0];
return {topic:msg.topic, payload:{topic:msg.topic ,payload:ssid, userID: msg.userID }};
